mapper.select: select mid id, mpassword password, mname name, memail email, mphone phone, mtel tel, mzipcode zipcode, maddress1 address1, maddress2 address2, mbirth birth, mgender gender, mrefid refId, mlogintype loginType, menabled enabled, mrole role, mgrade grade, mmileage mileage from member where memail = #{email} and mlogintype = #{loginType} and menabled = 1
mapper.insert: insert into member ( mid, mpassword, mname, memail, mphone, mtel, mzipcode, maddress1, maddress2, mbirth, mgender, mrefid, mlogintype, mtosno, menabled, mrole, mgrade, mmileage ) values( #{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{tel}, #{zipcode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{refId}, #{loginType}, #{tosNo}, #{enabled}, #{role}, #{grade}, #{mileage} )
mapper.select: select mid id, mpassword password, mname name, memail email, mphone phone, mtel tel, mzipcode zipcode, maddress1 address1, maddress2 address2, mbirth birth, mgender gender, mrefid refId, mlogintype loginType, menabled enabled, mrole role, mgrade grade, mmileage mileage from member where mname = #{name} and TO_CHAR(mbirth,'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(#{birth},'YYYY-MM-DD') and mlogintype = 'Email'

select mid id, mpassword password, mname name, memail email, mphone phone, mtel tel, mzipcode zipcode, maddress1 address1, maddress2 address2, mbirth birth, mgender gender, mrefid refId, mlogintype loginType, menabled enabled, mrole role, mgrade grade, mmileage mileage from member where mname = #{name} and memail = #{email} and mlogintype = 'Email'
mapper.update: update member set mname = #{name}, mphone = #{phone1} || #{phone2} || #{phone3}, mbirth = #{year} || '/' || #{month} || '/' || #{day}, mgender = #{gender}, mzipcode = #{zipcode}, maddress1 = #{address1}, maddress2 = #{address2} where memail = #{email}
mapper.select: SELECT MGRADE FROM MEMBER WHERE MID = #{mId}
